displayProperties.name: Enhanced Auto Rifle Loader
displayProperties.description: Greatly increases reload speed of Auto Rifles.

displayProperties.name: Enhanced Unflinching Auto Rifle Aim
displayProperties.description: Greatly reduces flinching from incoming fire while aiming Auto Rifles.

displayProperties.name: Auto Rifle Dexterity
displayProperties.description: Faster ready and stow speed for Auto Rifles.

displayProperties.name: Touch of Winter
displayProperties.description:
Your Glacier, Duskfield, and Coldsnap grenades have enhanced functionality.

Glacier Grenade: Adds a [Stasis] Stasis crystal and changes the formation.

Duskfield Grenade: Increases slow-field size and creates a small [Stasis] Stasis crystal on impact.

Coldsnap Grenade: Seeker travels farther, faster, and chains one additional time.

displayProperties.name: Explosive Wellmaker
displayProperties.description: Rapidly defeating combatants with explosive damage spawns a Solar elemental well.

displayProperties.name: Honed Edge
displayProperties.description: [Alternate Weapon Action]  : Consume the magazine and load a more powerful round.

displayProperties.name: Whisper of Rending
displayProperties.description: Kinetic weapons do increased damage to [Stasis] Stasis crystals and frozen targets.

displayProperties.name: Whisper of Conduction
displayProperties.description: Nearby [Stasis] Stasis shards track to your position.

displayProperties.name: Whisper of Rime
displayProperties.description: Collecting a [Stasis] Stasis shard grants a small amount of overshield, which falls off after 10 seconds. Collecting additional shards adds to the overshield and refreshes the timer.

displayProperties.name: Whisper of Hunger
displayProperties.description: Increases the melee energy gained from picking up [Stasis] Stasis shards.

displayProperties.name: Bottomless Grief
displayProperties.description: Increases magazine size. While you are the last living member of your fireteam, each final blow refills your magazine.

displayProperties.name: Elemental Capacitor
displayProperties.description:
Increased stats based on the currently equipped subclass.
•  increases your reload speed.
•  increases handling.
•  increases stability.
• [Stasis] moderately controls recoil and increases movement speed when aiming down sights.

displayProperties.name: Relentless Strikes
displayProperties.description: [Light Attack]  : Landing three light-attack hits within a short time grants Sword ammo.

displayProperties.name: Strength Armorer
displayProperties.description: Armor pieces with random stats you acquire will have a guaranteed minimum of 10 Strength, and are more likely to drop with higher Strength.

displayProperties.name: Superstructure Medic
displayProperties.description: While you are standing on a sync plate or are near a conflux, weapon attacks that hit powerful Vex combatants have a high chance to create a burst of healing for you and allies near you.

displayProperties.name: Aggressive Oracle Disruptor
displayProperties.description: Your equipped Auto Rifles, Fusion Rifles, Grenade Launchers, Trace Rifles, and Rocket Launchers deal additional damage to Oracles.

displayProperties.name: Vex Destroyer
displayProperties.description: Defeating a Vex with a grenade attack has a chance to spawn an Orb of Power. Multiple copies of this mod increase the Super energy granted when those Orbs are picked up.

displayProperties.name: Unflinching Trace Rifle Aim
displayProperties.description: Reduces flinching from incoming fire while aiming Trace Rifles.

displayProperties.name: Overload Wellmaker
displayProperties.description: Defeating a combatant with a finisher spawns 2 Arc elemental wells.

displayProperties.name: Stat Penalty
displayProperties.description: -30 Recovery ▼

displayProperties.name: Schwarzschild Condenser
displayProperties.description:
Void melee abilities [Stagger] stun unshielded combatants.

Strong against [Stagger] Unstoppable Champions.

displayProperties.name: Impulse Recycler
displayProperties.description: Grenade final blows grant grenade energy. Multiple copies of this mod increase the amount of energy gained.

displayProperties.name: Focused Fire
displayProperties.description: [Alternate Weapon Action]  : Swap to a tighter, close-ranged spread.

displayProperties.name: Trace Rifle Loader
displayProperties.description: Increases reload speed of Trace Rifles.

displayProperties.name: Reaping Wellmaker
displayProperties.description: After activating your class ability, your next weapon final blow spawns a Void elemental well.

displayProperties.name: Trace Rifle Targeting
displayProperties.description: Improved target acquisition, accuracy, and aim-down-sights speed for Trace Rifles.

displayProperties.name: Rewind Rounds
displayProperties.description: When this weapon's magazine is empty, it refills from reserves based on the number of hits.

displayProperties.name: Destabilizers
displayProperties.description: [Brake]  : Use while airborne to release roll stabilizers, and move [Movement] to roll.

displayProperties.name: Firefly
displayProperties.description: Precision kills with this weapon increase reload speed and cause the target to explode, dealing Solar damage to nearby enemies.

displayProperties.name: Trace Rifle Scavenger
displayProperties.description: Trace Rifles get bonus reserves when you pick up Special ammo.

displayProperties.name: Adaptive Frame
displayProperties.description:
Well-rounded.
[Heavy Attack]  : Uppercut.

displayProperties.name: Hammer of the Warmind
displayProperties.description:
The detonations from Warmind Cells you destroy cause disruption, stunning combatants, delaying ability energy regeneration and lowering combatant damage output.

Strong against   Overload Champions  and [Stagger]  Unstoppable Champions.

displayProperties.name: Vex Striker
displayProperties.description: Defeating a Vex with a precision hit has a chance to spawn an Orb of Power. Multiple copies of this mod increase the Super energy granted when those Orbs are picked up.

displayProperties.name: Precise Oracle Disruptor
displayProperties.description: Your equipped Bows, Hand Cannons, Linear Fusion Rifles, Scout Rifles, and Sniper Rifles deal additional damage to Oracles in the Vault of Glass.

displayProperties.name: Superstructure Defender
displayProperties.description: While you are standing on a sync plate or are near a conflux, weapon attacks that hit powerful Vex combatants have a high chance to weaken those combatants.

displayProperties.name: Hammer of the Warmind
displayProperties.description:
The detonations from Warmind Cells you destroy cause disruption, stunning combatants, delaying ability energy regeneration and lowering combatant damage output.

Strong against   Overload Champions  and [Stagger]  Unstoppable Champions.

displayProperties.name: Cornered
displayProperties.description: Faster charge time or draw time when surrounded by combatants.

displayProperties.name: Osmosis
displayProperties.description: Using your grenade ability changes this weapon's damage type to match your subclass until you stow it.

displayProperties.name: Discipline Armorer
displayProperties.description: Armor pieces with random stats you acquire will have a guaranteed minimum of 10 Discipline, and are more likely to drop with higher Discipline.

displayProperties.name: Well of Ions
displayProperties.description: Picking up an Arc elemental well causes your next melee to deal increased damage.

displayProperties.name: Celerity
displayProperties.description:
Increases weapon handling and reload speed. Gain the following effects while you are the last living member of your fireteam:
• Increased target acquisition
• Increased handling and reload speed
• Reduced flinch from incoming fire

displayProperties.name: Unflinching Auto Rifle Aim
displayProperties.description: Reduces flinching from incoming fire while aiming Auto Rifles.

displayProperties.name: Resilience Armorer
displayProperties.description: Armor pieces with random stats you acquire will have a guaranteed minimum of 10 Resilience, and are more likely to drop with higher Resilience.

displayProperties.name: Auto Rifle Targeting
displayProperties.description: Improved target acquisition, accuracy, and aim-down-sights speed for Auto Rifles.

displayProperties.name: Mercy
displayProperties.description: Loss has been forgiven.

displayProperties.name: Utility Finisher
displayProperties.description: Finishers restore class abilities. Requires one-tenth of your Super energy.

displayProperties.name: Cold Efficiency
displayProperties.description: Shattering a frozen target refills this weapon's magazine from reserves.

displayProperties.name: Enhanced Auto Rifle Loader
displayProperties.description: Greatly increases reload speed of Auto Rifles.

displayProperties.name: Winter's Wrath
displayProperties.description:
Summon a Stasis staff. While your Super is active:

[Shoot]  : Cast out a barrage of Stasis shards that freeze targets.

[Light Attack]  : Cast out a shockwave that shatters all frozen targets.

displayProperties.name: Trace Rifle Reserves
displayProperties.description: Increases the amount of Trace Rifle ammo you can carry.

displayProperties.name: LN2 Burst
displayProperties.description: Hold trigger to fire freezing projectiles.

displayProperties.name: Stasis Empowerment
displayProperties.description:
Defeat combatants with a Super or elemental weapon attack to create Elemental Orbs. Collecting Stasis Elemental Orbs grants you empowerment.

On Void/Stasis Day, this is applied while using a Stasis subclass.

displayProperties.name: Vitreous Entrance
displayProperties.description: Adds a Vex Glass appearance to your transmat effects.

displayProperties.name: Harpy Entrance
displayProperties.description: Adds a Harpy appearance to your transmat effects.

displayProperties.name: Intellect Armorer
displayProperties.description: Armor pieces with random stats you acquire will have a guaranteed minimum of 10 Intellect, and are more likely to drop with higher Intellect.

displayProperties.name: Destabilizers
displayProperties.description: [Brake]  : Use while airborne to release roll stabilizers, and move [Movement] to roll.

displayProperties.name: Trace Rifle Dexterity
displayProperties.description: Faster ready and stow speed for Trace Rifles.

displayProperties.name: Auto Rifle Loader
displayProperties.description: Increases reload speed of Auto Rifles.

displayProperties.name: Crow's Wings
displayProperties.description: [Heavy Attack]  : Fire a projectile.

displayProperties.name: Evolution
displayProperties.description:
Transmutation spheres you create can be picked up and wielded as weapons by you or your allies.
• [Light Attack]  : Light attack
• [Heavy Attack]  : Heavy attack
• [Block]  : Guard/Drain nearby combatants

displayProperties.name: Glacial Quake
displayProperties.description:
Summon a Stasis gauntlet. While your Super is active:

[Heavy Attack]  : Slam your gauntlet down to create a shockwave that freezes targets and sends out crystals to freeze additional ones.

[Light Attack]  : Supercharge your Shiver Strike for bonus damage. Sprint through crystals or frozen targets to shatter them instantly.

displayProperties.name: Heating Up
displayProperties.description: Final blows with this weapon increase accuracy and stability while improving vertical recoil.

displayProperties.name: Well of Life
displayProperties.description: Picking up a Solar elemental well grants increased regeneration for a short period of time.

displayProperties.name: Aggressive Frame
displayProperties.description:
Powerful, heavy swings.
[Heavy Attack]  : Slam.

displayProperties.name: Enhanced Auto Rifle Dexterity
displayProperties.description: Greatly increases ready and stow speed for Auto Rifles.

displayProperties.name: Tunnel Vision
displayProperties.description: Reloading after defeating a target greatly increases target acquisition and aim down sight speed for a short duration.

displayProperties.name: Baroque Entrance
displayProperties.description: Adds a Solstice appearance to your transmat effects.

displayProperties.name: Trace Rifle Ammo Finder
displayProperties.description: Increases your chance of finding Special ammo while you have a Trace Rifle equipped.

displayProperties.name: Ravenous Beast
displayProperties.description:
This weapon stores power when dealing or receiving damage.
[Alternate Weapon Action]  : Unleashes the beast when full.

displayProperties.name: House of Light Entrance
displayProperties.description: Adds a House of Light appearance to your transmat effects.

displayProperties.name: Enhanced Auto Rifle Loader
displayProperties.description: Greatly increases reload speed of Auto Rifles.

displayProperties.name: Grenade Launcher Dexterity
displayProperties.description: Faster ready and stow speed for Grenade Launchers.

displayProperties.name: Rocket Launcher Loader
displayProperties.description: Increases reload speed of Rocket Launchers.

displayProperties.name: Heavy Slug Thrower
displayProperties.description: [Aim Down Sights]  : Spin up.

displayProperties.name: Blast Radius
displayProperties.description: Become Charged with Light by rapidly defeating multiple combatants with Grenade Launchers or Rocket Launchers.

displayProperties.name: Firewalker
displayProperties.description: Solar final blows improve weapon damage. You are harder to slow or freeze with Stasis.

displayProperties.name: Whirlwind Guard
displayProperties.description: [Block]  : Use while wielding your Arc Staff to deflect incoming projectiles. Deflecting projectiles triples Arc Staff damage for a short time.

displayProperties.name: Ashes to Assets
displayProperties.description: Gain bonus Super energy on grenade kills.

displayProperties.name: Anti-Praetorian
displayProperties.description: Defeating a Praetorian grants you Super energy.

displayProperties.name: Anti-Oracle
displayProperties.description: Defeating an Oracle grants you Super energy.

displayProperties.name: The Fundamentals
displayProperties.description: [Alternate Weapon Action]  : Change this weapon's damage type.

displayProperties.name: Well-Rested
displayProperties.description:
XP gains increased by 2x for your first 7 Season Ranks this week.

Completing Seasonal Challenges grants the most progress, followed by bounties and quests.

displayProperties.name: Well-Rested
displayProperties.description:
XP gains increased by 2x for your first 5 Season Ranks this week.

Completing Seasonal Challenges grants the most progress, followed by bounties and quests.

displayProperties.name: Honed Edge
displayProperties.description: [Alternate Weapon Action]  : Consume the magazine and load a more powerful round.

displayProperties.name: Auto Rifle Dexterity
displayProperties.description: Faster ready and stow speed for Auto Rifles.

displayProperties.name: Dead Weight
displayProperties.description: Increases how quickly Dark Descent reaches its full potential.

displayProperties.name: Shieldcrash Wellmaker
displayProperties.description: Breaking a shield with the matching weapon type creates an elemental well.

displayProperties.name: Void Empowerment
displayProperties.description:
Defeat combatants with a Super or elemental weapon attack to create Elemental Orbs. Collecting Void Elemental Orbs grants you empowerment.

On Void/Stasis Day, this is applied while using a non-Stasis subclass.

displayProperties.name: Lightweight Frame
displayProperties.description:
Fast movement.
[Heavy Attack]  : Dash attack.

displayProperties.name: The Fundamentals
displayProperties.description: [Alternate Weapon Action]  : Change this weapon's damage type.

displayProperties.name: Glacial Harvest
displayProperties.description: Freezing targets creates [Stasis] Stasis shards around the frozen targets. Higher tier combatants create more shards.

displayProperties.name: Impact Conversion
displayProperties.description: Hitting targets with Ballistic Slam grants Super energy and activates Inertia Override.

displayProperties.name: Revolution
displayProperties.description: [Alternate Weapon Action]  : Swap firing modes.

displayProperties.name: Breakthrough
displayProperties.description: This weapon fires [Stagger] staggering projectiles. Strong against Unstoppable Champions.

displayProperties.name: Superstructure Striker
displayProperties.description: While you are standing on a sync plate or are near a conflux, weapon attacks that hit powerful Vex combatants have a high chance to stun those combatants.

displayProperties.name: Vex Breaker
displayProperties.description: Defeating a Vex with a melee attack has a chance to spawn an Orb of Power. Multiple copies of this mod increase the Super energy granted when those Orbs are picked up.

displayProperties.name: Rapid Oracle Disruptor
displayProperties.description: Your equipped Pulse Rifles, Shotguns, Sidearms, SMGs, and Swords deal additional damage to Oracles.

displayProperties.name: Precision Frame
displayProperties.description: [Shoot]  : Fire; release to detonate.

displayProperties.name: Warmind's Decree
displayProperties.description: Void splash damage final blows have a chance to create Warmind Cells.

displayProperties.name: Enhanced Unflinching Auto Rifle Aim
displayProperties.description: Greatly reduces flinching from incoming fire while aiming Auto Rifles.

displayProperties.name: Unstoppable Sidearm
displayProperties.description:
Aiming down sights with any Sidearm you are wielding loads a powerful explosive payload that stuns unshielded combatants.

Strong against [Stagger]  Unstoppable Champions.

displayProperties.name: Breach and Clear
displayProperties.description: When using a Grenade Launcher, damaging a boss, damaging a Champion, or breaking a combatant's shield reloads your stowed weapons and causes the combatant to take increased damage for a short duration.

displayProperties.name: Anti-Barrier Auto Rifle
displayProperties.description:
Auto Rifles you are wielding fire shield-piercing rounds and stun [Shield-Piercing] Barrier Champions.

Auto Rifles deal bonus damage against [Shield-Piercing] Barrier Champions.

displayProperties.name: Mobility Armorer
displayProperties.description: Armor pieces with random stats you acquire will have a guaranteed minimum of 10 Mobility, and are more likely to drop with higher Mobility.

displayProperties.name: Sentinel Shield
displayProperties.description:
[Super]  : Summon a shield of Void Light. 
While Sentinel Shield is active:
[Light Attack]  : Attack.
[Block]  : Block.
[Grenade]  : Perform a Shield Throw.

displayProperties.name: Dark Deliverance
displayProperties.description:
Fires remotely detonated projectiles that drop Void orbs on combatants.
[Shoot]  : Fire; release to detonate.

displayProperties.name: Liquid Cooling
displayProperties.description: Final blows with this weapon enable a Charged Shot for a short duration. Targets hit by this shot are instantly frozen at the cost of the weapon's entire magazine.

displayProperties.name: Overdrive
displayProperties.description: [Boost]  : Greater speed at risk of exploding.

displayProperties.name: Auto Rifle Targeting
displayProperties.description: Improved target acquisition, accuracy, and aim-down-sights speed for Auto Rifles.

displayProperties.name: Overload Hand Cannon
displayProperties.description: Landing consecutive hits disrupts combatants, stunning them, delaying ability energy regeneration and lowering combatant damage output. Strong against [Disruption] Overload Champions.

displayProperties.name: Temporal Unlimiter
displayProperties.description:
Defeating targets builds stacks of Overcharge.

[Alternate Weapon Action]  : Swap firing modes when fully Overcharged.

In alternative firing mode, hold the trigger to charge up and fire more powerful linear fusion shots.

displayProperties.name: Danger Zone
displayProperties.description: The blast radius of this weapon increases when surrounded by combatants.

displayProperties.name: Nova Warp
displayProperties.description:
Step between dimensions to subvert the laws of physics.
[Sprint]  : Teleport a short distance.
[Heavy Attack]  : Unleash a deadly Void eruption.

displayProperties.name: Timeless Mythoclast
displayProperties.description: Fires a single bolt per shot.

displayProperties.name: Whirlwind Guard
displayProperties.description: [Block]  : Use while wielding your Arc Staff to deflect incoming projectiles. Deflecting projectiles triples Arc Staff damage for a short time.

displayProperties.name: Diamond Lance
displayProperties.description:
Shatter or defeat targets with [Stasis] Stasis abilities to create a Stasis Lance.

[Shoot]  : Throw the lance to freeze targets on impact.

[Melee]  : Slam the lance to the ground to freeze targets in a small area.

displayProperties.name: Chaos Reach
displayProperties.description:
Unleash a long-range channeled beam of concentrated Arc energy.
[Super]  : Use while active to deactivate Chaos Reach early and save Super energy.

displayProperties.name: Chaos Accelerant
displayProperties.description: [Grenade]  : Overcharge your grenade, making it deadlier and more effective.

displayProperties.name: Subsistence
displayProperties.description: Defeating targets partially reloads the magazine from reserves.

displayProperties.name: Remote Detonation
displayProperties.description:
Grenades bounce.
[Shoot]  : Fire; release to detonate.

displayProperties.name: Blessing of Order
displayProperties.description: Rifts create beneficial seeker projectiles.

displayProperties.name: Recovery Armorer
displayProperties.description: Armor pieces with random stats you acquire will have a guaranteed minimum of 10 Recovery, and are more likely to drop with higher Recovery.

displayProperties.name: Boost
displayProperties.description: [Boost]  : Accelerate to a higher speed.

displayProperties.name: Argent Ordnance
displayProperties.description: While Charged with Light, readying or firing a Rocket Launcher grants it increased damage and reload speed. Damaging a combatant with a rocket consumes one stack of Charged with Light.

displayProperties.name: Auto Rifle Loader
displayProperties.description: Increases reload speed of Auto Rifles.

displayProperties.name: Rocket Launcher Scavenger
displayProperties.description: Rocket Launchers get bonus reserves when you pick up ammo.

displayProperties.name: Unflinching Auto Rifle Aim
displayProperties.description: Reduces flinching from incoming fire while aiming Auto Rifles.

displayProperties.name: Adrenaline Junkie
displayProperties.description: Grenade final blows grant bonus damage and handling for a moderate duration.

displayProperties.name: Tesseract
displayProperties.description: [Heavy Attack]  : Use while sprinting with full energy to launch a heavy Blink attack.

displayProperties.name: Overload Submachine Gun
displayProperties.description:
Uninterrupted fire from your equipped SMGs grants bullets that stun combatants, delaying ability energy regeneration and lowering combatant damage output.

Strong against [Disruption] Overload Champions.

displayProperties.name: Reflective Vents
displayProperties.description: Sliding reflects projectiles.

displayProperties.name: Vortex Frame
displayProperties.description:
[Heavy Attack]  : Launch a heavy spin attack.
Heavy attacks are stronger with full energy.

displayProperties.name: Unstoppable Grenade Launcher
displayProperties.description:
When you ready or reload a Grenade Launcher, for a short period, that weapon stuns Unstoppable Champions.

Strong against [Stagger]  Unstoppable Champions.

displayProperties.name: Thermal Blooming
displayProperties.description: Rapidly defeating combatants with  Solar or [Stasis] Stasis melee attacks creates an Orb of Power for your fireteam members.

displayProperties.name: Anti-Barrier Scout Rifle
displayProperties.description:
Scout Rifles you are wielding fire shield-piercing rounds and stun [Shield-Piercing] Barrier Champions.

Scout Rifles deal bonus damage against [Shield-Piercing] Barrier Champions.

displayProperties.name: Feast of Light
displayProperties.description: Pick up Orbs of Power to overcharge your Super.

displayProperties.name: Caster Frame
displayProperties.description:
[Heavy Attack]  : Launch a heavy projectile attack.
Heavy attacks are stronger with full energy.

displayProperties.name: Vernier Thrusters
displayProperties.description: [Dodge Left] , [Dodge Right]  : Quick lateral movements.

displayProperties.name: Spectral Blades
displayProperties.description:
Summon a pair of deadly Void blades and stalk the battlefield in a veil of shadows.
[Light Attack]  : Perform a quick melee attack.
[Heavy Attack]  : Perform a heavy attack and once again vanish from sight.

displayProperties.name: Well of Tenacity
displayProperties.description: Picking up a Void elemental well reduces the damage you take from combatants for a short period of time.

displayProperties.name: Sundering Blast
displayProperties.description: Stunning a Champion creates an explosive blast.

displayProperties.name: Release the Wolves
displayProperties.description: [Alternate Weapon Action]  : Swap to a longer, more powerful burst.

displayProperties.name: Air Brakes
displayProperties.description: [Brake]  : Brake and corner more aggressively.

displayProperties.name: Colossal Quiver
displayProperties.description: Maximizes quiver size.

displayProperties.name: Gathering Light
displayProperties.description:
Final blows grant stacks.
[Alternate Weapon Action]  : Refresh abilities.
